name: Enayam Jumma Masjid
description: Enayam Jumma Masjid, located in Kanyakumari district, is a revered Islamic center known for its pivotal role in community gatherings and religious activities. It serves as a place of worship where Friday Jumma prayers are conducted, offering spiritual guidance and fostering unity among worshippers through Quranic studies, educational programs, and social initiatives. The masjid stands as a symbol of Islamic heritage and communal harmony, catering to the spiritual needs of the local Muslim community in Enayam.
